mapper.select: SELECT p10_ins_outles_court_re.ins_outles_court_re_id, p10_ins_outles_court_re.create_time AS authorizationTime, p10_court.court_id, p10_court.court_name, p10_institution.ins_id, p10_institution.ins_name, p10_outles.outles_id, p10_outles.outles_name FROM p10_ins_outles_court_re LEFT JOIN p10_court ON p10_ins_outles_court_re.court_id = p10_court.court_id AND p10_court.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_ins_outles_court_re.ins_id = p10_institution.ins_id AND p10_institution.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_ins_outles_court_re.outles_id = p10_outles.outles_id AND p10_outles.del_flag = 0 WHERE p10_ins_outles_court_re.del_flag = 0 AND p10_ins_outles_court_re.ins_id = #{query.insId} AND p10_ins_outles_court_re.court_id = #{query.courtId}
